fr.gouv.finances.dgfip.xemelios.data.impl.pool

Interface Pool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DbcpPool, DsPool

    public interface Pool
    Contract interface of Pool

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Returns a Connection from pool
      int getNumActive()
      Returns the current number of active connections that have been allocated
      int getNumIdle()
      Returns the current number of idle connections that are waiting to be allocated
      void releaseConnection(java.sql.Connection connection)
      Allows a connection retrived from pool via getConnection() to return to pool
      boolean shutdown()
      Shutdowns the pool, and close all connection in it.
